title: UCIL Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 08 Medical Officer Posts
description: The Uranium Corporation of India Limited (UCIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 08 Medical Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS and post-graduation can apply for the UCIL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection proc...
